content:
create a pricing table for the agencys charges
for social media content creation and management 
facebook/Instagram : 32000 per month for 12-15 posts 
youtube : 28000 per month for 8 Video edits 
for every video shoot price is 9000 per shoot for maximum 4 videos 
For running ad campaigns for one city is 15k for 
if we are running all 3 cities it will be discounted at 12k \* 3 cities = 36k
if we are running all 5 cities it will be discounted at 10k \* 3 cities = 50k

there will also be incentive for every conversion that comes due to our campaigns at 2000 INR per conversion 


Please write in English language.
